snippet.title: MLB The Show 16 | 'Get Famous' trailer | PS3 & PS4
snippet.description:
Step up to the batters box and build your major league legacy with MLB The Show 16! Join the baseball Legends as you make your way from a nobody to the Hall of Fame. Experience the journey through Road to the Show and other new Diamond Dynasty modes - Battle Royale and Conquest mode - as you climb your way to the big leagues.

MLB The Show 16 offers the most immersive, authentic baseball game on consoles. This year The Show offers even more gameplay improvements, new game modes, and a greater ability to personalize your baseball experience. 

Major League Baseball and Minor League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball Properties, Inc. and MLB Advanced Media, L.P., as applicable. All rights reserved. Visit MLB.com, the Official Site of Major League Baseball and MiLB.com, the Official Site of Minor League Baseball.

Visitwww.MLBPLAYERS.com, the Players Choice on the web.
